questions.title: 我更喜欢与一个淳朴老实的人交朋友。
questions.answer: I'd rather make friends with a simple and honest people.

questions.title: 我还是宁愿和你手牵手直到老去。
questions.answer: I'd rather hand in hand with you until we were old.

questions.title: 我们还是在中国餐厅吃饭吧。
questions.answer: We'd rather have a dinner in Chinese restaurant.

questions.title: 夏天的晚上我还是和你一起去海边散步吧。
questions.answer: I'd rather have a walk with you by the sea in the evening in summer.

questions.title: 我宁愿在幽静偏远的乡村休息。
questions.answer: I'd rather have a rest in a tranquil and remote village.

title: ——你觉得这样华丽的发簪怎么样啊？
——我宁愿喜欢素净的打扮。

answer.en: What do you think of this gorgeous hairpin?
I'd rather a simple and pure appearance.

title: ——我的腿好痒，你的卧室有好多蚊子。用灭蚊器杀死它们。
——我宁愿点一盘蚊香。

answer.en: My legs are itchy, there are many mosquitoes in your bedroom. Use mosquito killer to kill them.
I'd rather to burn a mosquito-repellent incense.
I'd rather talk about something else.
Well, then what do you want to talk?
